itunes:subtitle: This is a special undercover episode of Drinkin' Bros where we show you the nightmare of customer service, this one was AT&T.  We also get a Drinkin' Bro to call in an unmask their 3rd party services and why we can't talk to an American inside their comp...
itunes:summary:
This is a special undercover episode of Drinkin' Bros where we show you the nightmare of customer service, this one was AT&T.  We also get a Drinkin' Bro to call in an unmask their 3rd party services and why we can't talk to an American inside their company anymore.
